body_html:
ddot_ has a consistent signature, so it shouldn't matter right?

(MKL has cblas too)

My goal is, we're falling back to cblas when possible which has a consistent API, but some BLAS libs dont provide cblas API.

body:
ddot_ has a consistent signature, so it shouldn't matter right?

(MKL has cblas too)

My goal is, we're falling back to cblas when possible which has a consistent API, but some BLAS libs dont provide cblas API.
